mapper.select: SELECT A.bno , A.uno , A.bcd , A.btitle , A.bctnt , A.bidx , A.bord , A.bdept , A.brdt , A.bhit , B.unm as writer FROM t_board as A LEFT JOIN t_user as B ON A.uno = B.uno where A.uno = #{param}
SELECT COUNT(case when uno = #{param} then 1 end) FROM t_board;
SELECT COUNT(case when uno = #{param} then 1 end) FROM t_board_reply;
